description.p: A fine wooden bow, colored Red and black, the Hama Yumi has been passed down from the Yumiko Family for generations. With a single fire from an arrow, the Hama Yumi is said to banish the evil from within its target.

sheet.p: Ability Score Increase.Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

description.p: Bane of all Evil.If the enemy you are shooting with this bow is evil, the bow will do 3d10 extra radiant damage.
Delayed Strike.On a critical hit, the arrow will be magically enhanced and wherever it lands, a delayed fireball will be cast there. You may choose to explode it as a bonus action.
Spells.The Hama Yumi has 5 charges, and lets you cast; Detect Evil and Good(1 charge), Protection from Evil and Good(1 charge), and Dispel Evil and Good(3 charges)
Damage.The Hama Yumi does 4d6 Piercing damage, and 3d10 Radiant damage if the target is evil.
Random Properties.The Hama Yumi has been cursed by an ancient Evil, cursing the user with some detrimental effects.

A beautiful silver pendant created by the trickery god Dolus, the pendant looks like two silver wings emerging from an ovular Sapphire in the center, 3 chains emerging from the tips of the angel's wings, all to a small clasp on the end to fit the pendant perfectly to your neck.

sheet.p: Ability Score Increase.Your Wisdom score increases by 2.

Mirage.Create a perfect mirror image of yourself. If you make an action, bonus action, or reaction, the mirage will follow your movements perfectly, if you do a ranged attack, the mirage will also make one, dealing half of your rolled damage on a hit (uses your roll), if casting an offensive spell, the mirage will also cast said spell, directed to wherever you casted it to (dealing half damage). The mirage lasts for 1 hour and this feature.

description.p: Illusionist's delight.You may cast every Illusion spell from 1st to 9th level once/per long rest, and every cantrip infinitely.
Mayhem.You may cast delayed blast fireball at 9th level once per long rest.
Random Properties.The Necklace of Mirages has some randome properties
Created by the best blacksmiths in the Norman Empire, Aegis was created for a legendary fighter to assist him in defeating an evil Warlock. Aegis has an innate +2.
Magic Parry.Whether it be a fireball, lightning strike, or even a charm, the Aegis can parry it. Allows you to cast Counter spell at 9th level once/per short rest.

Magic Resistance.If a spellcaster targets you with a ranged/melee spell, they have disadvantage to hit, but if it is a spell save dc, then you have advantage. The shield's resistance to magic has also granted it immunity to heat metal.
